name: Disciple from the Darkness
description:
In this 2D beat them all, you're controlling a Dark Knight using darkness to refile his power.
Our theme for this Pizza Jam was: Disciple from the Darkness.

Here the credits for all the free assets we used:

Background: https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-halloween-2d-game-backgrounds/
FootStep sound: https://freesound.org/people/DRFX/sounds/347371/
Cast Fireball sound: https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/442827/
Sword Swing sound: https://freesound.org/people/XxChr0nosxX/sounds/268227/
Background Music: Sound pack from sonniss: https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc2017/
Knight Sprite sheet by KIN NG: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/knight-sprite-sheet-free-938...
Dragon Warrior Sprite sheet by KIN NG: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/dragon-warrior-free-93896
Simple Health bar by Tank & Healer Studio: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/simple-health-bar-free-95420
